description: Another great gadget from ADATA, the microSD High Capacity (microSDHC) is about a quarter of the size of an SD card and is the newest standard of SD flash memory specifically designed for use with small mobile phones and other devices.ADATA’s Turbo microSDHC cards use the new speed “class” rating of Class 6 that guarantee a minimum data transfer rate of 6MB/sec. for optimum performance with devices that use microSDHC. The microSDHC card provides higher capacity (4GB) for more photos, more music, more videos, more of everything you need in today’s digital world.They also come with a full-size SD adapter to turn them into full-size SDHC cards. The combination of a microSDHC card and an adapter means users can pack light and do more with a single card, interchanging it with many devices. ADATA’s microSDHC card bundled with a SD adapter is the right solution for your mobile gadgets
title: ADATA 4 GB Class 6 microSDHC Flash Memory Card 4GUSDHC6
